application_type_full: Householder planning & demolition in a conservation area
description: Replacement of existing windows from single-glazed windows with timber frame to double-glazed windows with aluminium frame (to the front elevation); replacement of existing single-glazed windows with UPVC frame with double-glazed windows with UPVC frame to side and rear elevation; alteration to rear elevation involving removal of existing patio doors with three patio doors; replacement of existing single-glazed windows with timber frame front entrance door to double-glazed windows with timber frame door; installation of solar panels to the flat roof of the single storey rear extension and to the rear roofslopes; alteration to front forecourt involving installation of permeable resin
decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following drawings and documents: A-EG-054-PL-100 02 EXISTING & PROPOSED First Floor Plan , A-EG-054-EL-310 02 PROPOSED Front, Rear & Side Elevations, A-EG-054-EL-300 02 EXISTING Front, Rear & Side Elevations, A-EG-054-PL-200 02 EXISTING & PROPOSED Front Driveway, EX-EG-A-54 Rev 01 Design and Access Statement, EX-EG-A-54 Rev 00 DETAILS AND MATERIAL SCHEDULE, A-EG-054-SL-001 01 SITE LOCATION PLAN, A-054-BP-002 01 SITE PLAN (BLOCK PLAN).
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021).

| The hereby approved ^IN; rooflights to the roof slope of the hereby development shall be Conservation style rooflights and lie flush with the roof and shall be retained as such for the lifetime of the development.

Reason:  To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, and to safeguard the character and appearance of the conservation area in accordance with policies D4 and HC1 of the London Plan (2021) and policies 7B and 7C of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013). | The hereby approved side-facing windows shall contain only obscure glass and only have top openings at a minimum of 1.7m from floor level.

Reason: To protect the living conditions of neighbouring properties in accordance with policies D3 and D6 of the London Plan (2021), policies policy 7.4 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013) and policies 1.1 and 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012).

| Any solar PV or solar thermal equipment installed on the roof of the subject dwellinghouse must adhere to the of provisions, limitation and conditions of Schedule 2, Part 14, Class A of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) Order 2015.

REASON: To protect the living conditions of occupants of nearby properties in accordance with policies 7B and 7.4 of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013) and Policy 7.6 of the London Plan (2016).
